title: Former Amazon Worker Leading Staten Island Union Efforts Arrested
sub_head: NYPD arrested Christian Smalls, two current workers after receiving a trespassing complaint at the warehouse
body:
A former Amazon.com Inc . employee who wants to unionize workers at the companyâ€™s Staten Island warehouse was arrested Wednesday for trespassing at that facility, according to the New York Police Department.
Christian Smalls was charged with resisting arrest, obstruction of governmental administration and trespassing, the NYPD said. Two current Amazon workers were also arrested and charged with obstruction of government administration, police said.
